text: Patricia Rooney Mara (born April 17, 1985) is an American actress. She has acted in movies, including A Nightmare on Elm Street (the remake of the 1984 horror movie) and The Social Network. Mara played Lisbeth Salander, the title character for the 2011 remake movie The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo. She was nominated for an Academy Award for her performance. In 2013, she starred in the movie Side Effects. Mara is also known for her charity work. She oversees the charity Uweza Foundation, which supports programs for children and families in the Kibera slum in Nairobi, Kenya. Her sister is Kate Mara. ==Filmography== Year Title Role Notes 2005 Urban Legends: Bloody Mary Classroom girl #1 2006 Law & Order: Special Victims Unit Jessica DeLay TV series (1 episode: "Fat"); credited as Tricia Mara 2007 Women's Murder Club Alexis Sherman TV series (1 episode: "Blind Dates and Bleeding Hearts") 2008 Dream Boy Evelyn 2008 The Cleaner Rebecca Smith TV series (1 episode: "Rebecca") 2009 Dare Courtney 2009 The Winning Season Wendy 2009 ER Megan TV series (2 episodes) 2009 Friends (With Benefits) Tara 2009 Youth in Revolt Taggarty 2009 Tanner Hall Fernanda 2010 A Nightmare on Elm Street Nancy Holbrook 2010 The Social Network Erica Albright 2011 The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo Lisbeth Salander 2013 Ain't Them Bodies Saints Ruth Guthrie 2013 Side Effects Emily Taylor 2013 Her Molly 2017 Song to Song Faye ==References== Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from New York (state) Category:American fashion designers Category:American voice actors Category:People from Bedford, New York
